sn37.34:1: "Bhikkhus, growing in five areas of growth, a woman noble disciple grows with a noble growth, and she acquires the essence, acquires the best, of this bodily existence. What are the five? She grows in faith, in virtue, in learning, in generosity, and in wisdom. Growing in these five areas of growth, a woman noble disciple grows with a noble growth, and she acquires the essence, acquires the best, of this bodily existence.
sn37.34:2: "When she grows here in faith and virtue,In wisdom, generosity, and learning,The virtuous woman lay discipleAcquires right here the essence for herself."sn.iv.51
